data.title: Erika Toda
data.text:
Japanese actress (born 1988)

Erika Toda (戸田 恵梨香, Toda Erika, born August 17, 1988) is a Japanese actress.[1][2]

Toda has starred in many Japanese television dramas, including Liar Game,[3] Code Blue, Ryusei no Kizuna, and Keizoku 2: SPEC.[4] She has also had supporting roles in many other popular TV dramas, such as Boss, Nobuta wo Produce, Engine, and Gal Circle. In the manga adaptation movie, Death Note, she played the role of Misa Amane.[5]

In 2020, Toda married actor Tori Matsuzaka, who co-starred in the 2015 film April Fools.[6]

On November 28, 2022, the agency announced that Toda was pregnant.[7] On May 4, 2023, Toda gave birth to her first child.[8]
